Israel ready to let ships bring aid to Gaza's shores - ministerIsrael is prepared to let ships deliver aid to the war-ravaged Gaza Strip "immediately" as part of a proposed sea corridor from Cyprus, the Israeli foreign minister said on Sunday, naming four European countries as potential participants. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 11:29:55 GMT YJVLJB6KLZJZZOBFH5QXUTJZXE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-ready-let-ships-bring-aid-gaza-shores-minister-2023-12-31/Dan Williams世界中东地区
Struggling Caracas restaurants, bars offer tour to boost salesSeveral bars and restaurants in Venezuela's capital Caracas are offering an eight-hour tour where customers visit each establishment in a bid to boost low sales at a time of persistent inflation. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 11:17:04 GMT GTZG2E2HIBOBTMZWJ7UKWKCP7A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/struggling-caracas-restaurants-bars-offer-tour-boost-sales-2023-12-31/Efrain Otero世界美洲
Israeli government approves appointment of new foreign ministerThe Israeli government on Sunday approved the appointment of a new foreign minister to replace Eli Cohen, who will become energy minister as part of a pre-arranged ministerial rotation, a government statement said. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 10:52:46 GMT 57CGDMZNNFKVZELIFOZBXZYZ4U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-government-approves-appointment-of-new-foreign-minister-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中东地区
Maersk pauses Red Sea sailings after Houthi attack on container shipIranian-backed Houthi militants attacked a Maersk container vessel, prompting the company to pause all sailing through the Red Sea for 48 hours, Maersk said on Sunday. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 10:33:55 GMT HKYZZA4F5BJ4DOFVZP7AH4THE BUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/maersk-pauses-red-sea-sailings-after-houthi-attack-on-container-ship-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中东地区
Congo opposition candidates call for street protests and election rerunA group of opposition presidential candidates in the Democratic Republic of Congo asked supporters on Sunday to take to the streets to protest after provisional results of the disputed election are released. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 08:53:36 GMT Y7OMPNDA2BL6PJJRCLOZOJ2NH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-release-provisional-results-disputed-presidential-vote-2023-12-31/Ange Kasongo世界非洲
Final bodies found after China's most serious earthquake in a decadeThe bodies of the two remaining people missing in the aftermath of China's most serious earthquake in nearly a decade were found on Sunday, a tragedy that has renewed concern over exposed populations in seismically active zones. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 07:01:58 GMT JEWSD2DZINJ27A6J5ER54QENHU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/final-bodies-found-after-chinas-most-serious-earthquake-decade-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
Kharkiv strikes were retaliation for Ukraine's Belgorod attack, Russia saysRussia on Sunday said it attacked military facilities in the Ukrainian city of Kharkiv overnight, including a hotel housing military commanders and "foreign mercenaries", in response to Ukraine's strikes on Belgorod the previous day. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 05:42:13 GMT Z3F6EEZT7FKLRGEMK3AZXVATBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/toll-ukraine-air-strikes- Russianns-belgorod-rises-22-officials-say-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Australia thunderstorms raise risk of flash floodingParts of Australia's east face severe thunderstorms for the second straight day on Sunday, the weather bureau warned, with heavy rains raising the risk of dangerous flash flooding. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 05:20:55 GMT AYWTHZ7B5BLOLFB47HI2期刊https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-thunderstorms-raise-risk-flash-flooding-2023-12-31/Renju Jose世界亚太地区
Russia has sentenced more than 200 captured Ukrainian fighters so far - LavrovRussian courts have sentenced more than 200 Ukrainian fighters to prison terms since Moscow started its military operation in Ukraine, Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said in an interview with the state RIA news agency published on Sunday. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 02:22:49 GMT N3WZPU4UZZLW7NXXNZ25SRMRHY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-has-jailed-more-than-200-captured-ukrainian-fighters-so-far-lavrov-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
China calls Taiwan president frontrunner a destroyer of peaceChina's government called the frontrunner for Taiwan's next president "confrontational" and a destroyer of peace after he spoke at a presidential debate and said the island's sovereignty and independence belong to its people. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:25:53 GMT 5R5CRTRLWROU5IBLIPF5MZXII4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-calls-taiwan-president-frontrunner-peace-destroyer-2023-12-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
US says it shot down 2 missiles launched from Houthi-controlled areasThe United States shot down two missiles headed toward a container ship in the southern Red Sea and launched from Houthi-controlled areas of Yemen on Saturday, U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) said. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:23:56 GMT CSF6H5AYORJYTAZKMMNHHWTMZE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-it-shot-down-two-missiles-launched-in-houthi-control-areas-2023-12-31/Reuters世界
